chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: 
I still haven't received the package

Thank you for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Angelica - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer, thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

This order will be refunded in 24 hours 

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Angelica - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We require a handwritten CND where all details including order number, number of package, dealer name, name of speditors and package content are handwritten. 

Thank you.
Regards,
SY

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 244,74 € to the customer.

Kind regards, 
Angelica from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We require a valid email address from the customer in order to continue with investigations. Please assist us. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

the email address is: pia2charline3@gmail.com

Have a nice day.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team
